title: [Icemule, Hope Alley]
description: A strange heat comes from the back of the building to the west, melting the snow around the black and white granite pavers into a fluid slush.  An enormous granite statue has been arranged so that the figure seems to be crossing the sunlit cul-de-sac from the frozen wall to the warmth of the city.

An unnatural heat emerges from the back of the building to the west, melting the snow around the black and white granite pavers into a fluid slush.  An enormous granite statue has been arranged so that the figure seems to be crossing the darkened cul-de-sac from the frozen wall to the warmth of the candlelit city.
